name: simple-clothing-store
description: Simple webstore implementation with Paypal & Printful integration

scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build-tux: npm run build-frontend && mv frontend/build ../build && npm start
scripts.build-win: npm run build-frontend && move frontend\build ..\build && npm start
scripts.build-win-clean: if exist build rmdir /S /Q build && npm run build-win
